original_question: Which type of ferns have yellow sporangia and no leaves?
diverse_qns: What is the name of the fern that features yellow sporangia and lacks leaves?
Can you tell me which fern species exhibits yellow sporangia and is devoid of leaves?
What type of fern is characterized by its yellow sporangia and apparent lack of leaves?
Identify the fern that is leafless and possesses yellow sporangia?
Which variety of ferns are identified by their yellow sporangia and absence of leaves?
Do you know the fern that has yellow sporangia and doesn't have leaves?
Is there any type of fern which lacks leaves and has yellow sporangia?
Could you specify the type of fern that has no leaves but yellow sporangia?
Would you be able to inform me about the fern that is leafless but has yellow sporangia?
Can you name the variety of fern which is defined by yellow sporangia and no leaves?
pred_diverse_ans: Polypodium, specifically P. vulgare or P. dryopteris.
